text: Berrini is a train station on CPTM Line 9-Emerald, located in the district of Itaim Bibi in São Paulo. ==History== The station was built by CPTM, during the "South Line Dinamization" project, and opened on 14 June 2000, located next to Avenida Engenheiro Luís Carlos Berrini, a tribute to engineer Luís Carlos Berrini, who named the station. ==References== Category:CPTM stations Category:Railway stations opened in 2000
title: Berrini (CPTM)
